text:
Marly de Pádua Macieira Sarney (born December 4, 1932) is a Brazilian socialite and philanthropist. She is the wife of the former President José Sarney. She was First Lady of Brazil during the presidency of her husband, between 1985 and 1990.
Sarney married José Sarney on July 12, 1952. She was born in São Luís, Brazil.
